Html:
Hi Im a final year student of University of Westminster. For my final year project im using this tohcless SDK & bulding an application. The code which i did is working fine(private void pnlCapture_MarkerMove(object sender, MarkerMoveEventArgs e)
        {
}
only for one marker.
I want to know is how can i do for multiple markers.
The system is detecting multiple markers. But marker move code is working for only one marker. I badly need a help in this.
Scenario is i have 2 marker(Orange and Blue)
For an example take that i have one image in the system & i want to move that image according to these markers. The lefthand side of the image shd be tracked using orange colour marker & right hand side of the image should be tracked using blue colour marker.
